overview: This video tells the story of a mountain bike competition. The cute cast of 9 Czech/Slovak models all sport wonderful brightly colored spandex racing tights. Watch as the sports medic, Tony Hawkins, applies his own special kind of treatment to the lads' sore and aching muscles. He knows just how to motivate their racing skills and also their ample cocks. George Spitz watches as Hans Miller plows the good doctor. He can't keep his dick in his pants and releases a mighty load. Five super scenes with a great 3-Way between the top finishers at the end. It's great to be the winner. You get a trophy, a bottle of champagne and the runner-up's ass!
title: P.O.F. No. 6: Mountain Bikers
